name: Rubik's Cube (itch)
description:
Test version of the game Rubik's Cube.

Control:

A, D - to turn the camera around the cube.
middle mouse button - for free rotation of the camera.
mouse wheel - camera approaching.
clicking on the part of the cube and swipe to the side - to scroll the face.

Game mode:

Building a Rubik's Cube at the time when you collect the cube, press the stop to see your build time.
